lead_paragraph: Hassan Adams, the Nets’ second-round draft pick, signed with the team yesterday after passing a physical on his recently broken right foot. Adams, a guard taken with the 54th pick out of Arizona, averaged 17.5 points and almost 5 rebounds last season. He is the only player in Pac-10 Conference history to record 1,800 points, 700 rebounds and 200 steals in a career. He hurt his foot in June during a workout for the Nets before the draft.
